Class SafeMediaPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.utils.SafeMediaPlayer
public final class SafeMediaPlayer extends Object
A lightweight wrapper around JavaFX MediaPlayer accessed via reflection. This avoids a compile-time dependency on javafx.media for IDEs that don't have the module on the language server classpath. At runtime, if JavaFX media is available this will delegate to the real classes; otherwise it becomes a no-op player.

      public double getTotalDurationSeconds()

    • setCycleCount

    • dispose

      public void dispose()

    • setOnEndOfMedia

      public void setOnEndOfMedia(Runnable r)
      If JavaFX MediaPlayer is available, register a Runnable to be executed when media ends. This is a no-op when JavaFX media is not available.

    • playFromStart

      public void playFromStart()
      Attempt to restart playback from the beginning reliably. If MediaPlayer.seek(Duration.ZERO) is available, use it; otherwise fall back to stop()/play().
